name: Soccers
description:
**No Annoying Ads**

This is a soccer game that you can actually play soccer in. There are many game modes, and you can pass, block, steal and shoot just you might expect in any soccer game. You will not be disappointed by this blocky soccer style game.52857048c8

Features:

- 2v2, 3v3
- Many game modes
- Enter a tournament of 2v2 or 3v3
- Different countries
- Different difficulties ( practice, easy, medium, hard, expert )
- Game stats
- Upgrade your teams stats
- Different play-styles with different teams
52857048c8
